Strike fear into the hearts of your enemies and raise troop morale on the battlefield with the free Ã¢â‚¬ËœBannermenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ micro-DLC for Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar. This new cosmetic content adds four fully-animated units to the game: including the Roman Aquilifer and the Gallic Hornblower. These will be automatically integrated into your units upon download - making your veteran units look even more distinctive and fearsome on the battlefield.

This DLC is a small thank you for the fantastic support from you, the community, but larger additional content is planned and will be coming soon. And of course we'll proceed with adding further updates to the game on a regular basis.

Last but not least, here's the changelog for the latest update:

- improved saving of command progress and unit health
- fixed pathfinding bug that could cause units to move into unbuilt forts
- fixed problem with 'force safe settings' option
- shader optimizations
- fixed projectile rendering
- fixed multiple CTD bugs
- fixed cursor when the mouse highlights a unit formation that is behind the gui
